## useCheckResource() function

Check a principal's permissions on a resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useCheckResource(request: Omit<CheckResourceRequest, "principal">, options?: RequestOptions): AsyncResult<CheckResourcesResult>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[AsyncResult](./react.asyncresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;[CheckResourcesResult](./core.checkresourcesresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```typescript
const {isLoading, data:decision, error} = useCheckResource({
  resource: {
    kind: "document",
    id: "1",
    attr: { owner: "user@example.com" },
  },
  actions: ["view", "edit"],
});

decision?.isAllowed("view"); // => true
```
